name: multiapp-server
description: Backend server for AI tools application

scripts.debug: node -e "console.log('Node version:', process.version); console.log('Current directory:', process.cwd()); console.log('Files:', require('fs').readdirSync('.')); console.log('Package.json exists:', require('fs').existsSync('./package.json')); try { require('express'); console.log('Express loaded successfully'); } catch(e) { console.log('Express error:', e.message); }"
